text: L. E. Fletcher Technical Community College is a community college in Schriever, Louisiana in Terrebonne Parish. The school was founded on June 23, 1948. ==Academics== The college provides both academic and technical training. It offers programs in arts and sciences, business, manufacturing and services, nursing and health, and Petroleum. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Community colleges in Louisiana Category:Educational institutions established in 1948 Category:1948 establishments in Louisiana Category:Universities and colleges accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools Category:Buildings and structures in Terrebonne Parish, Louisiana Category:Education in Terrebonne Parish, Louisiana
title: L. E. Fletcher Technical Community College
